strategic_summary: GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY: Complete PETITION_010 (Trade Empire) this turn. Control all 4 Commerce+Maritime courtiers for 8 VP + 5 gold + 2 card draws. Generate +7 gold from Brynn & Calico abilities (9 gold total after bonuses = economic dominance secured). Maintain Market district stronghold while locking in permanent courtier control.

recruitment.rationale: Saving action economy and gold for petition completion and ability usage. Hand has diverse agents; no immediate recruitment needed. Pool influence must go toward maritime courtier control.

actions.rationale: Gold generation ability. Essential for rebuilding reserves after heavy investment. Brynn is at position 2 (active since Turn 2), so ability is available Turn 3+.
Calico is at position 3 (becomes active THIS TURN at Turn 3). This is the first turn the ability is available. Stacks with Brynn for +7 total gold generation.

actions.reasoning: Control maritime courtier pair for PETITION_010 completion. 3 influence on a 4-slot courtier with no current competition = controller status.

additional_placement.reasoning: Complete maritime pair. 2 slots filled = automatic control. Costs only 2 of remaining 4 pool after COURT_011 placement.
additional_placement.note: This may be included as 2nd courtier placement if turn mechanics allow 2 courtier placements per turn. If only 1 courtier placement allowed per turn, prioritize COURT_011 (larger courtier = more valuable control). Adjust Action 3 accordingly.

free_actions.requirements_met_explanation: Control both Commerce courtiers (COURT_001 & COURT_002) from previous turns. Placing influence on COURT_011 & COURT_012 this turn creates control of all 4 required courtiers.
free_actions.roi_explanation: This is the highest-value petition achievable this turn. 8 VP alone extends my lead. The +5 gold bonus brings total gold this turn to 14 (from 2 starting). The 2 card draws provide recruitment opportunities for future cycles.

free_actions.rationale: FREE influence placement (not an action). Completes Market district control by taking the only uncontrolled square (MKT_07, 1 VP). Activates Market district power access for future turns.

resource_allocation.note: Remaining 2 influence can be placed on Market (via Harrow ability places 2 free) or held for next turn. No district squares targeted in paid placements this turn - all pool goes to petition completion.

gold_calculation.rationale: Gold generation abilities stack with petition bonus to create 12x gold multiplier (2→14). This is critical economic dominance - enough gold to invest in upgrades, whitewashing, or further placements next cycle.

vp_calculation.lead_over_opponents: Extends lead by 8 VP. P1 at 45 (18 behind), P3 at 45 (18 behind). Economic dominance secured.

courtier_control_summary.economic_significance: Controlling all Commerce + Maritime courtiers is the gold standard of economic power. Petition_010 triggers when all 4 are controlled. This creates a permanent economic monopoly.

tactical_notes.threat_assessment: P3 has 13 influence (high pool) but mostly in Market (competitive). P1 at 7 influence (monitoring). Maritime courtiers uncontrolled = no competition for this turn's placement. Securing them NOW prevents opponents from building toward Trade Empire themselves.
tactical_notes.market_district_status: 6 of 7 squares controlled (MKT_01, MKT_03, MKT_05 confirmed as mine). Harrow placement takes MKT_07. Complete district control = 1 gold/turn START bonus + access to district power (gain 3 gold or place 2 free influence in adjacent).
tactical_notes.position_lock: With 4 courtiers controlled + Market district controlled + 14 gold reserves + 55 VP lead, economic engine is LOCKED IN. Opponents cannot catch up if I maintain these assets.

commitment_statement: This turn executes the core Economic Powerhouse strategy: Maximize gold generation through ability stacking, Convert influence into permanent courtier control via petition completion, Expand economic engine footprint by securing maritime trade routes. Result: Economic dominance guaranteed.
